title: "Investors Bet on Multilingual Voice Assistants by Big Names and Newcomers"
excerpt: "Investor interest in multilingual voice assistants is more than just talk. A recent slew of investments and partnerships in a range of AI-enabled customer service tools attest to the increasing productization of research into machine translation (MT) and speech translation in a growing field now referred to as VaaS or Voice Assistant as a Service."
